mean_cn: adj. 专横的，独断的，傲慢的
mean_en: often trying to control the behavior of other people in an annoying or unwanted way
sentence: Her overbearing father asks her to go home before 6 p.m. every day.
sentence_trans: 她专横的父亲要求她每天晚上6点前回家。
word_etyma: over过度 ＋ bear忍受 ＋ ing...的 → 让人忍无可忍的性格 → overbearing蛮横的，傲慢的
